member.name: T:RealTime.RealTime
member.summary: This sample displays the performance measurements of selected cpu counters of specified Virtual machine (if available) from the current time at the console.

member.name: M:RealTime.RealTime.displayValues(Vim25Api.PerfEntityMetricBase[],System.Collections.Hashtable)
member.summary: Displays the values of sample time range.

member.name: M:RealTime.RealTime.constructOptions
member.summary: This method is used to add application specific user options
member.returns: Array of OptionSpec containing the details of application specific user options

member.name: M:RealTime.RealTime.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
